content: --देशः {1} the middle region or space, the middle part of anything. {2} the waist. {3} the belly. {4} the meridian. {5} the central region, the country lying between the Himālaya and Vindhya mountains; हिमवद्विंध्ययोर्मध्यं यत्प्राग्विनशनादपि . प्रत्यगेव प्रयागच्च मध्यदेशः स कीर्तितः .. <ls>Ms. 2. 21.</ls>
